		Question: what type of music did antonio vivaldi play
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is: Baroque music. 

Antonio Lucio Vivaldi was a Venetian composer and violinist of the Baroque era. He is considered one of the greatest composers of all time and is known for his operas, concertos and violin compositions. courtiers wrote about his musical prodigy from a young age and said he danced, sang and played the violin before he was 13 years old.
